header.all: Unlimited movies, TV shows, and more.
header.ready: Ready to watch? Enter your email to create or restart your membership.
main.enjoyp: Watch on Smart TVs, Playstation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players, and more.
main.download: Download your shows to watch offline.
main.downloadp: Save your favorites easily and always have something to watch.
main.watchp: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop, and TV without paying more.
main.kidsp: Send kids on adventures with their favorite characters in a space made just for them—free with your membership.
questions1.p1: Netlfix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices.
questions1.p2: You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want without a single commercial – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover and new TV shows and movies are added every week!
questions2.p: Watch Netlfix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from EUR7.99 to EUR17.99 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.
questions3.p1: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netlfix account to watch instantly on the web at netlfix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netlfix app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.
questions3.p2: You can also download your favorite shows with the iOS, Android, or Windows 10 app. Use downloads to watch while you're on the go and without an internet connection. Take Netlfix with you anywhere.
questions4.p: Netlfix is flexible. There are no pesky contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.
questions5: What can I watch on Netlfix
questions5.p: Netlfix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netlfix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.
questions6.p1: The Netlfix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and movies in their own space.
questions6.p2: Kids profiles come with PIN-protected parental controls that let you restrict the maturity rating of content kids can watch and block specific titles you don’t want kids to see.
sign.not: * You have not activated your free account.
loged.moviep: A family hiding a shocking secret starts overs in Madrid, where new relationships complicate their plans and the past begins to catch up with them
loged.like: We think you'll like this dark serie
error.find: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page
